Issue.creator: agunde
Issue.summary: Investigate Dispatcher Halting after Signature Verification on Block Response
Issue.description: When a Validator is dealing the a block response handling the genesis block, It seems like the dispatcher never gets a handler status back from the signature verifier and therefore does not continue processing the genesis block and put the validator in a bad state and causes an "AssertionError: http://rest-api-1:8080/blocks is not available within 10 attempts".
